---
title: "gapminder test"
author: "Martin"
date: "10/8/2019"
output: html_document
---
gapminder_sum <- gapminder %>% 
group_by(continent) %>%
summarize(ave_lifeExp) = mean
(lifeExp))

view(gapminder_sum)
write_csv(gapminder_sum, here::here)
("gapminder_sum.csv"))

gapminder_sum %>%
ggplot(aes(x = continent,
y = ave_lifeExp)) +
geom_point()+
theme_bw()
